022    private final HashMap<String, String[]> starters = new HashMap<>();
023
024    /**
025     * Creates new form NamegenPanel
026     */
027    public NamegenPanel() {
028        initComponents();
029
030        starters.put("Star Wars Style", WeightedLetterNamegen.STAR_WARS_STYLE_NAMES);
031        starters.put("Viking Style", WeightedLetterNamegen.VIKING_STYLE_NAMES);
032        starters.put("USA Male First Name", WeightedLetterNamegen.COMMON_USA_MALE_NAMES);
033        starters.put("USA Last Name", WeightedLetterNamegen.COMMON_USA_LAST_NAMES);
034
035        inputComboBox.setModel(new DefaultComboBoxModel(starters.keySet().toArray()));
036        inputComboBox.setSelectedIndex(0);
037        inputComboBoxItemStateChanged(null);
038        generateButtonActionPerformed(null);
039    }
040

117
118    private void generateButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_generateButtonActionPerformed
119        String[] original = starters.get((String) inputComboBox.getSelectedItem());
120        WeightedLetterNamegen namegen = new WeightedLetterNamegen(original, 2);
121        String[] names = namegen.generate(20);
122        outputList.setListData(names);
123    }//GEN-LAST:event_generateButtonActionPerformed
124
125    private void inputComboBoxItemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_inputComboBoxItemStateChanged
126        String[] original = starters.get((String) inputComboBox.getSelectedItem());
127        inputList.setListData(original);
128    }//GEN-LAST:event_inputComboBoxItemStateChanged
